Title: Fernox F4 central heating leak sealer 500ml (1)
Description: Sealing small and inaccessible leaks and weeping in central heating systems, Fernox F4 Express internal leak sealer helps to reduce the risk of pressure loss and boiler breakdown. Once dispersed the product cleverly seeks out oxygen ingress, forming a polymer formulated to seal the offending pinhole. Fast and simple, F4 can show results anywhere between one and 24 hours after application, helping to prevent blockages and restrictions in boilers, pumps and other components and safety devices and saving on inconvenient and costly complete system drain downs.

Title: Fernox LS-X leak sealer external 50 gm (1)

Title: Adey MC4+ Rapide MC4 Mc4+ Leak Sealer Rapide 300Ml (1)
Description: Quick and powerful, Adey MC4+ Rapide leak sealer is highly concentrated for a strong, reliable seal. Flowing around the entire system, this fast-working sealer finds even the most hard to reach and smallest leaks, helping to restore pressure without expensive maintenance. Title: Fernox F4 Express F4 central heating leak sealer 400ml (1)
Description: Sealing small and inaccessible leaks and weeping in central heating systems, Fernox F4 Express internal leak sealer helps to reduce the risk of pressure loss and boiler breakdown. Once dispersed the product cleverly seeks out oxygen ingress, forming a polymer formulated to seal the offending pinhole. Fast and simple, F4 can show results anywhere between one and 24 hours after application, helping to prevent blockages and restrictions in boilers, pumps and other components and safety devices and saving on inconvenient and costly complete system drain downs. Using barrier pressure pack technology and compressed air propellent, this 400ml aerosol can is non-flammable. Because the propellent is not mixed with the active product it poses no risk of air ingress into the system, negating the risk of corrosion.
